article_title: CIA Director Brennan: CIA Won't Waterboard Ever Again, Even if Future President Orders It
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

CIA Director John Brennan said Sunday in an interview with NBC News that the CIA “would not agree” to carry out waterboarding again, even if commanded by a future president.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

GOP presidential candidates Donald Trump and Sen. Ted Cruz (R-TX) have both said they would be for the use of waterboarding in some capacity. Trump is in favor of going “beyond” waterboarding, while Cruz stated the act is needed in some cases.

“Absolutely, I would not agree to having any CIA officer carrying out waterboarding again,” Brennan said.
